about_the_game:
You got a new job in the office.

In general, you are satisfied with everything here.

Good salary, flexible work schedule, no overtime.

But there are no ideal conditions, and you still have one big problem...

And that problem is Katie, your manager.

She is so hungry that she can swallow a person whole!

Be careful and don't make her angry.

Also, don't try to be friends with her. All relationships ends in her stomach.

Choose your words and phrases carefully in every dialogue.

You must balance between love and hate, to stay in the neutral zone and survive.

With each passing day, the topics for dialogue may become more frank.

Try to hold out at this job at least until payday.

Get the good ending and stay alive XD

The visual novel contains:

  • Three endings (1 good, 2 bad)

  • Soft vore

  • Same size vore

  • Belly growth

  • Female pred

  • Male prey

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of human-on-human soft vore (being eaten alive and whole), abnormal stomach stretching, oral sex and exposed genitals.

name: Office Lady: Vore Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2,80 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
